steps.text:
Use a metal object (e.g. a hammer) to strike the
engine block in the vicinity of the knock sensor. Regardless of the
engine type the following areas are particularly suitable. Below
the bolt used to fasten the alternator to the engine block, flat
surfaces on the engine block at the front or rear and the engine
mounting (use a metal extension if necessary).

Download Setup file (the Tech 32 uses only Setup
files, no reference curves).

Use a metal object (e.g. a hammer) to strike the
engine block in the vicinity of the knock sensor. Regardless of the
engine type the following areas are particularly suitable: Below
the bolt used to fasten the alternator to the engine block, flat
surfaces on the engine block at the front or rear and the engine
mounting (use a metal extension if necessary).
